tweets.text: Rohit Sharma edges out Virat Kohli as the better captain for Team India and IPL teams. Rohit boasts a 74.54% ODI win rate, 82.85% in T20Is, and led India to the T20 World Cup 2024 and Champions Trophy 2025. He also won 5 IPL titles with Mumbai Indians. Kohli excels in Tests with a 58.82% win rate but has no IPL titles with RCB and lower limited-overs stats (68.42% ODI, 59.18% T20I). Rohitâ€™s trophy haul and calm leadership shine in high-pressure formats, making him the stronger captain overall.
